name: Square Millimeter
intro: Microscopic area unit, suitable for measuring the area of precision parts, chip circuits, and micro-components.

name: Square Centimeter
intro: Area unit for small objects, adapted for measuring small areas such as mobile phone screens, paper, and jewelry surfaces.

name: Square Decimeter
intro: Auxiliary unit for medium areas, mostly used for describing the area of small furniture, tabletops, and plates.

name: Square Meter
intro: International benchmark unit of area, the core measurement standard for construction, decoration, real estate, and land surveying.

name: Are
intro: Small area unit for agriculture and forestry, adapted for measuring small farmland, nurseries, and green spaces.

name: Hectare
intro: Common unit for agriculture and land, suitable for measuring medium and large plots such as farmland, woodland, and parks.

name: Square Kilometer
intro: Large-scale area unit, adapted for describing the area of cities, countries, river basins, and nature reserves.

name: Square Inch
intro: Unit for small objects in the UK and US, mostly used for measuring the area of mechanical parts, electronic components, and hardware accessories.

name: Square Foot
intro: Core unit for real estate and decoration in the UK and US, adapted for measuring and pricing housing area, flooring, and wall surfaces.

name: Square Yard
intro: Medium area unit in the UK and US, mostly used for measuring the area of construction, site paving, and fabric cutting.

name: Rood
intro: Traditional agricultural unit in the UK, adapted for area division and measurement of small and medium-sized farms and plots.

name: Acre
intro: Core unit for agriculture and real estate in the UK and US, suitable for describing the area of farmland, manors, and large venues.

name: Square Mile
intro: Large-scale area unit in the UK and US, adapted for measuring the scope of cities, counties, and nature reserves.

name: Tsubo (Japan/Taiwan China)
intro: Core real estate unit in Japan and Taiwan China, mostly used for pricing the area of residential and commercial properties.

name: Se (Japan)
intro: Traditional agricultural unit in Japan, adapted for measuring and trading the area of farmland and woodland.

name: Tan (Japan)
intro: Large agricultural plot unit in Japan, mostly used for describing the area of farms and forest farms.

name: Cho (Japan)
intro: Large-scale land unit in Japan, adapted for measuring the area of county-level regions and large parks.

name: Chinese Mu
intro: Core traditional agricultural unit in China, the mainstream standard for farmland and homestead ownership registration.

name: Chinese Qing
intro: Bulk agricultural land unit in China, suitable for measuring the area of farms, forest farms, and development zones.
